user_title.description: Required, should be returned like {"user_title": "Mr." or "Mrs."}

name.description: Optional, the name of the user, should be returned like {"name": "John"}

target_driver.description: Required, the person who will drive the car, should be returned like {"target_driver": "Self"}

age.description: Optional, the age of the user, should be returned like {"age": "20-35"}

family_size.description: Optional, the family size of user, should be a number, should be returned like {"family_size": "1"}

price_sensitivy.description: Optional, the price sensitivy of the user for buying a car, should be returned like {"price_sensitivy": "High"}

residence.description: Optional, where the user live, format should be "country+province+city", should be returned like {"residence": "China+Beijing+Beijing"}

parking_conditions.description: Optional, the parking conditions of the user, should be returned like {"parking_conditions": "Allocated Parking Space"}
